Row.Text: [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Great Works of Writing provides +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science. Library gains 2 [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Great Writing slots and 1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer point per turn.

A district unique to Korea for scientific endeavors. Replaces the Campus district. +4 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science. -1 [ICON_Science] Science for every adjacent district tile. Mines receive +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science for every adjacent Seowon district. Farms receive +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food for every adjacent Seowon district. Must be built on Hills.

[ICON_Governor] Governors established in a city provide +3% [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Faith] Faith for each Promotion they have earned, including their first. Gain the Hwarang unique unit when the Iron Working technology is researched.
Korean unique Classical era melee unit when Seondeok is their leader. Earns [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Faith] Faith from kills.
